str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: From kata and a derivative of skeuos; to prepare thoroughly; by implication, to construct, create.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A priest, one who offers sacrifice to a god (in Jewish and pagan religions; of Christians only met.). From hieros; a priest.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To go in, enter (originally: I shall go in). From eis and eimi; to enter.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.
A tent, booth, tabernacle, abode, dwelling, mansion, habitation. Apparently akin to skeuos and skia; a tent or cloth hut.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To complete, accomplish, perfect. From epi and teleo; to fulfill further, i.e. Execute; by implication, to terminate, undergo.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Service rendered to God, perhaps simply: worship. From latreuo; ministration of God, i.e. Worship.
